Module com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis
Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model

Interface PlayersCombat

All Known Implementing Classes:
Luis, Marco
public interface PlayersCombat
This interface implements different methods in charge of giving you a combat system in the game. Different types of attacks are implemented for the character use, and attacks that can be received.
Author:
Christian Jesus Parra Cofre
See Also:
Enemies
